title: Vice President Internal
organization: Junior Information Systems Security Association - Asia Pacific College
description: As the Vice President Internal for the Junior Information Systems Security Association - Asia Pacific College (JISSA-APC), I provide strategic Leadership to oversee the organization's internal operations and foster a cohesive community of cybersecurity enthusiasts. My role focuses on comprehensive Event Planning for key initiatives, including General Assemblies, team-building sessions, and skill-development workshops, ensuring alignment with our mission. I also drive effective Event Management by coordinating logistics and streamlining communication across departments, ensuring that all internal activities run seamlessly to maximize member engagement and organizational growth.
responsibilities: Provide strategic leadership to oversee internal operations of JISSA-APC
Plan and organize General Assemblies, team-building sessions, and skill-development workshops
Coordinate logistics and streamline communication across departments
Foster a cohesive community of cybersecurity enthusiasts
Ensure alignment of all internal activities with organizational mission
achievements: Successfully managed multiple large-scale internal events
Enhanced member engagement through improved event coordination
Strengthened interdepartmental communication and collaboration

title: Prime Minister
description: The Prime Minister serves as the chief executive and highest-ranking officer of APC–SPEAKS. As the head of the organization, the Prime Minister provides overall leadership, ensures the achievement of the organization's mission, and represents APC–SPEAKS within the school community and beyond. This role upholds the values of public speaking, debate, and student leadership while guiding the organization's members toward growth and excellence.
responsibilities: Serve as chief executive and highest-ranking officer of APC-SPEAKS
Provide overall leadership and strategic direction for the organization
Represent APC-SPEAKS within the school community and external events
Uphold values of public speaking, debate, and student leadership
Guide members toward personal and professional growth
achievements: Led organization as chief executive officer
Successfully represented APC-SPEAKS in various institutional events
Fostered culture of excellence in public speaking and debate

title: Assistant Developer Lead
organization: Junior Philippine Computer Society - Asia Pacific College
description: As the Assistant Developer Lead for the Junior Philippine Computer Society - Asia Pacific College, I co-manage the technical team's operations, ensuring the successful deployment of organization-wide software initiatives. My responsibilities focus on strategic Project Planning to optimize development timelines and resource allocation, alongside rigorous Quality Assurance testing to guarantee system reliability and performance.
responsibilities: Co-manage technical team operations for JPCS-APC
Ensure successful deployment of organization-wide software initiatives
Conduct strategic project planning and optimize development timelines
Perform quality assurance testing to guarantee system reliability
Manage resource allocation for development projects
achievements: Successfully deployed multiple organization-wide software systems
Improved development efficiency through strategic planning
Maintained high quality standards across all projects

title: Executive Logistics Officer
description: The Executive Logistics Officer ensures the smooth and efficient management of all logistical requirements for SOAR activities, projects, and events. This role is vital in supporting the organization's operations by handling resources, venues, materials, and on-ground coordination.
responsibilities: Manage all logistical requirements for SOAR activities and events
Coordinate resources, venues, and materials for organizational projects
Oversee on-ground coordination during events
Ensure smooth execution of all SOAR operations
Support organization-wide initiatives through efficient logistics management
achievements: Streamlined logistics processes for multiple major events
Successfully coordinated resources across various activities
Enhanced operational efficiency through improved logistics management

title: Logistics Head
description: The Logistics Head ensures the smooth and efficient management of all logistical requirements for APC-MSC activities, projects, and events. This role is vital in supporting the organization's operations by handling resources, venues, materials, and on-ground coordination.
responsibilities: Lead logistics operations for Microsoft Community activities
Manage resources, venues, and materials for events
Coordinate on-ground logistics during community events
Ensure efficient execution of all organizational activities
Oversee logistics team and delegate responsibilities
achievements: Successfully managed logistics for all Microsoft Community events
Optimized resource allocation and venue coordination
Led logistics team to deliver seamless event execution

title: Logistics Officer
description: As a Logistics Officer for APC Gaming Genesis, I provide essential logistical support to ensure the seamless execution of gaming tournaments and community events. My responsibilities include coordinating venue setups, managing equipment inventory, and overseeing resource allocation to maintain operational efficiency during high-paced activities.
responsibilities: Provide logistical support for gaming tournaments and esports events
Coordinate venue setups and technical equipment arrangements
Manage equipment inventory and maintain resource availability
Oversee resource allocation during high-paced gaming activities
Ensure operational efficiency for all gaming community events
achievements: Successfully supported multiple gaming tournaments
Maintained smooth operations during high-intensity esports events
Optimized equipment management and venue coordination

title: Operations Associate
organization: Junior Information Systems Security Association - Asia Pacific College
description: The Operations Associate ensures the effective coordination of both logistical and event-related tasks for JISSA - APC Chapter's activities. Serving as a bridge between the Logistics and Events Committees, this role involves preparing resources, supporting program execution, and ensuring that all operations run smoothly from planning to post-event wrap-up.
responsibilities: Coordinated logistical and event-related tasks for JISSA activities
Served as liaison between Logistics and Events Committees
Prepared resources and supported program execution
Ensured smooth operations from planning to post-event phases
Managed both operational and event management responsibilities
achievements: Successfully bridged logistics and events operations
Contributed to seamless execution of JISSA events
Enhanced coordination between multiple committees

title: Logistics Associate
description: The Logistics Officer supports the Executive Committee by handling logistical requirements for APC-MSC's projects, meetings, and events. The officer ensures that all materials, venues, and resources are prepared and available to guarantee the smooth execution of activities.
responsibilities: Supported Executive Committee with logistical requirements
Handled logistics for projects, meetings, and community events
Ensured materials, venues, and resources were properly prepared
Coordinated logistics to guarantee smooth activity execution
Assisted in planning and implementing logistics strategies
achievements: Provided reliable logistics support for all MSC activities
Contributed to successful execution of community events
Built strong foundation in logistics management

title: Member
organization: Junior Philippine Computer Society - Asia Pacific College
description: As a member of JPCS, I commit to actively participating in the organization's activities that promote growth in the field of information technology and computer science. I represent the organization in both internal and external events while developing my skills, knowledge, and network.
responsibilities: Actively participated in JPCS activities and initiatives
Represented organization in internal and external events
Engaged in workshops and training sessions
Contributed to IT and computer science community building
Collaborated with fellow members on various projects
achievements: Successfully participated in multiple organizational events
Built strong foundation in IT and computer science
Developed professional network within tech community

title: Work Immersion Student
organization: Taguig City Health Office, Sanitation Office
description: Completed work immersion program focused on health administration and digital systems. Gained hands-on experience in a professional government office environment, producing health identification documents and certificates while managing database operations. This immersion provided invaluable exposure to real-world work culture, professional communication standards, and collaboration with experienced healthcare administrators and civil service professionals.
responsibilities: Produced health identification cards and medical certificates for constituents
Encoded citizen information and health records into government databases
Maintained data accuracy and confidentiality in health information systems
Collaborated with healthcare professionals and administrative staff
Learned government office protocols and professional workplace standards
achievements: Successfully processed hundreds of health IDs and certificates
Gained practical experience in database management and data entry
Developed professional communication skills in government setting
Adapted quickly to workplace culture and professional environment
